request.description: Регистрация пользователя с ролью Owner. Может создавать компании (company) и пользоваться услугами предусмотренными тарифными планами.

response.name: Валидация

header.name: Cache-Control
header.description: Tells all caching mechanisms from server to client whether they may cache this object. It is measured in seconds

header.name: Content-Type
header.description: The mime type of this content

header.name: Date
header.description: The date and time that the message was sent

header.name: Server
header.description: A name for the server

header.name: Transfer-Encoding
header.description: The form of encoding used to safely transfer the entity to the user. Currently defined methods are: chunked, compress, deflate, gzip, identity.

header.name: X-Powered-By
header.description: Specifies the technology (ASP.NET, PHP, JBoss, e.g.) supporting the web application (version details are often in X-Runtime, X-Version, or X-AspNet-Version)

response.body: {"email":["The email field is required."],"password":["The password field is required."]}

item.name: Оплатить заказ на смену тарифного плана

request.description: Оплата тарифного плана компании. Если поле type = acquiring возвращает ссылку на страницу банка. Если поле type = banking возвращает ссылку на счет в формате pdf. Для создания оплаты должны быть заполнены контакты и реквизиты компании.

item.name: Инвойсы (Invoices)
item.description: Название "Инвойс" оставлено таким, ибо для системы это и счет-фактура, и выставленный счет, и кредитная нота. Сам тип зависит от направления (direction) = sales = продажи, счет фактура, purchases = покупки, выставленный счет, и от самого типа (invoice_type_id) = Invoice и Credit_note

header.name: Access-Control-Allow-Headers
header.description: Used in response to a preflight request to indicate which HTTP headers can be used when making the actual request.

header.name: Access-Control-Allow-Methods
header.description: Specifies the method or methods allowed when accessing the resource. This is used in response to a preflight request.

header.description: Specifies a URI that may access the resource. For requests without credentials, the server may specify '*' as a wildcard, thereby allowing any origin to access the resource.

header.name: X-Powered-By
header.description: Specifies the technology (ASP.NET, PHP, JBoss, e.g.) supporting the web application (version details are often in X-Runtime, X-Version, or X-AspNet-Version)

header.description: Tells all caching mechanisms from server to client whether they may cache this object. It is measured in seconds
